mapper.sql: u.user_id AS userId, u.login_name AS loginName, u.real_name AS realName, u.`password` AS `password`, u.phone AS phone, u.email AS email, u.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, u.login_type AS loginType, u.`status` AS `status`, u.create_user AS createUser, u.create_time AS createTime, u.modify_user AS modifyUser, u.modify_time AS modifyTime
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `user` WHERE login_name = #{loginName}
AND user_id != #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user`( user_id, login_name, real_name, `password`, phone, email, last_login_time, login_type, `status`, create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time )VALUES ( #{userId}, #{loginName}, #{realName}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{loginType}, #{status}, #{createUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT , COUNT(lm.send_user) AS leaveMessageNumber FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN leave_message lm ON u.user_id = lm.send_user AND lm.is_read = 0 WHERE u.`status` = 1
AND u.login_name LIKE '%${keyWord}%' OR u.realName LIKE '%${keyWord}%'
GROUP BY u.user_id ORDER BY MAX(lm.create_time) DESC ,CASE WHEN COUNT(lm.send_user) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
